title: Update: Shape-shifting 2021 Alchemy Arktos: The most versatile full suspension MTB ever?
content:
Update: We now have information on what is required to convert between the different travel and wheel size configurations of the 2021 Alchemy Arktos. To convert your bike to a mullet configuration, you’ll need the mullet link available at $80. To upgrade the rear wheel travel, you’ll need an extender from Alchemy, which retails at […]

The post Update: Shape-shifting 2021 Alchemy Arktos: The most versatile full suspension MTB ever? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
